reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Youth Resource Centre in Savannakhet

description.narrative: Laos is part of the group of least developed countries. Many young people leave school unfinished and are in danger of societal exclusion in Laos. Youth are also in the risk group of being driven into alcoholism, substance abuse or victims of human traffic king. Through the project, youth in danger of exclusion gain confidence and new skills, which enable them to position themselves in further education or work. The project aims at encouraging the city?s youth to make good choices regarding life and the futu re while developing in life management skills. The project offers youth a chance to develop their English language, computer and job application related skills. Vocational and apprenticeship training is also provided according to need. In the youth centre it is possible to practice different hobbies like sports and music. Training on different issues is organised throughout the year. The project?s goal is holistically healthy youth in the city of Savannakhet. The project purpose is an encouraged youth of Sa vannakhet, because they have gotten the possibility of developing their skills. For the youth, the project increases the possibilities for internships in real working environments, improves their self-esteem, activates them through the youth centre and imp roves their life management skills, as they can discuss their life together with responsible adults. The project?s beneficiaries are 8 148 young people and 76 300 family members, villagers or teachers.
